name: Bacon and Smoked Salmon Pinwheels
author: Avon- status quo PRO
summary: A classic cocktail party appetizer with a new twist.
ingredients: 3  fresh chives, chopped, or more to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C)
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper
Place bacon in a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned, about 10 minutes
Drain bacon slices on paper towels
Make an aioli by combining mayonnaise, garlic, chives, salt, and pepper in a bowl
Roll the puff pastry out into a 12-inch square
Spread aioli onto the pastry quickly and top with bacon, tomatoes, and salmon
Roll up jelly roll-style and cut into 12 equal pieces
Lay on the prepared baking sheet and let chill for about 30 minutes
Bake in the preheated oven until golden, about 18 minutes
